mapper.select: SELECT * FROM storage_nodes ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO storage_nodes (node_name, storage_type, storage_path, capacity, used_space, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{nodeName}, #{storageType}, #{storagePath}, #{capacity}, #{usedSpace}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE storage_nodes SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{nodeId}
